definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: He dismounted and helped Uxbridge down and then returned to the business of beating the French.
sentences.chinese: 他跳下馬，扶阿克斯布里奇下來，回頭就再戰法軍。

sentences.english: French estimates were that the Viet Minh had minimal artillery support, and France was bound to win.
sentences.chinese: 據法國估計，越盟幾乎沒有大炮助陣，法軍勝券在握。

sentences.english: French troops, making a last-ditch stand at the river Marne, were in desperate need of reinforcements.
sentences.chinese: 法軍背城借一，在馬恩河佈防，同時亟待增援。

sentences.english: At Borodino the French overwhelmed the Czar's troops.
sentences.chinese: 在鮑羅季諾，法軍打敗了沙皇軍隊。

sentences.english: French rifle platoons of the first line have retreated to the Sart farm and continue to fight.
sentences.chinese: 一線的法軍步槍排開始撤退到薩爾農場並繼續戰鬥。

sentences.english: The French were defeated at the battle of Blenheim, which led to an end of French hegemony over Europe.
sentences.chinese: 布萊尼姆一役，法軍敗北，法國的歐洲霸權從此結束。

sentences.english: Charles Cousin Montauban was the French commander in British-French Army.
sentences.chinese: 英法聯軍中的法軍司令是孟鬥班。

sentences.english: The former French barracks is the sole U.S. base on the Horn of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 這個前法軍軍營是美軍在索馬里唯一的基地。

sentences.english: At the end of the battle, a French colonel called his soldiers to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭結束時，法軍一名上校叫手下撤退。

sentences.english: A bit of the north door, broken by the French, hangs suspended to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 北門被法軍打破的一塊門板至今還掛在牆上。

sentences.english: The fast-moving German panzers were constantly behind them.
sentences.chinese: 快速移動德國裝甲集羣不斷把法軍拋在了身後。

definition: Rhode Island, US state/Rhodes, an island of Greece
Vanuatu, country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
the war of 1904-1905 between Russia and Japan

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
